quest.name: We'll Meet Again
journal:
 Quest Sync
Blaste's fraught expression is in stark contrast to the tranquil surroundings.

dialogue.name: BLASTE
dialogue.text: Ah, we meet again. The familiar who was with Charmion, yes? My apologies if I seem a little distracted, but I am actually in the midst of searching for someone.

dialogue.name: BLASTE
dialogue.text: Oh, I don't believe we've met. As much as I would like to engage in more meaningful conversation, I am actually in the midst of searching for someone.

dialogue.name: BLASTE
dialogue.text: It's my mentor, who taught me practically everything I know. Now, she has relinquished her role and is ready to make her final journey. But before she does, there is an important matter I must convey to her.

dialogue.name: BLASTE
dialogue.text: The last concept in her care─a beautiful, winged creature─has been approved for life on Etheirys!

dialogue.name: BLASTE
dialogue.text: Please, will you help me look for her? There is a strong chance you will find her at Philomythes Notos. Her most distinguishing feature is her chestnut-colored hair, tied into a single, flowing lock, much like a monoceros's tail.

dialogue.name: BLASTE
dialogue.text: I have sent a familiar of my own to the north to look for my mentor. I would be very grateful if you could search elsewhere, starting with Philomythes Notos.

dialogue.name: BROWNHAIRWOMAN04287
dialogue.text: You wish to speak with me?

dialogue.name: BROWNHAIRWOMAN04287
dialogue.text: Ah, yes. I had a feeling she might say that. As I have told her, my decision has been made.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: But what about that winged creature? It was a success!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Well, she can't say I didn't try.

dialogue.name: BROWNHAIRWOMAN04287
dialogue.text: Glad tidings, to be certain, but my work is done. This news was more than sufficient, and I thank you for it.

dialogue.name: BROWNHAIRWOMAN04287
dialogue.text: Nothing can deter me from my chosen course, and I must join my predecessors in the hereafter. Tell Blaste to name the creature as she pleases... And that I wish her every happiness.

dialogue.name: BROWNHAIRWOMAN04287
dialogue.text: Now, our brief encounter has reached its end. Farewell.

dialogue.name: BLASTE
dialogue.text: She's not with you...did you at least find her?

dialogue.name: BLASTE
dialogue.text: I should've known nothing would sway her. All I can do is hope she finds blessed respite in the aetherial sea...and that we may one day be reunited in another life.

dialogue.name: BLASTE
dialogue.text: Until then, I will carry on her legacy, beginning with the naming of the creature she cared for so dearly. I think I shall name it after her. That way, she will live on through her work...forever.
